snippet.title: despelote behind-the-scenes: Julián Cordero & Sebastián Valbuena on the inspirations behind the game
snippet.description:
Julián Cordero and Sebastián Valbuena reflect on how memory and childhood shaped despelote. Wishlist now on Steam: https://s.team/a/2367820/

Despelote is a soccer game about people. Get immersed in the streets and parks of Quito through the eyes and ears of eight year old Julián. Dribble, pass and shoot your soccer ball around town, and see what happens when you kick it someone's way. Feel the city change as Ecuador comes closer than ever to qualifying for the World Cup. Despelote is coming to PS5, Xbox Series S / X & PC.
https://despelotegame.com/
